title: What are the electronic devices that are commonly used in electrical appliances? - Quora

response.answer_text: Custom-made controllers implemented in one or two IC packages that are specific to the type of appliance. Ovens will use one type, washing machines another, and so on. There will be a small number of discrete components needed as well, usually in the interfaces to the various input and output devices, switches, displays, sensors. solenoid valves and motor control components. Discrete power electronics may be needed to control large currents e.g. for washing machine motors.
Mostly there are the basic components Resistors, capacitors , inductors,..more to it transistors, diodes, gates or IC’s clocks timers.. etc they are all used depending on the applications need.
